segments.text: I notice the woman is so focused on drying that plate, completely unaware of her surroundings.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's amazing how she doesn't see the water overflowing right in front of her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being so mischievous, taking cookies while she's distracted.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really going for it, climbing on that stool to reach the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn't fall; that stool looks really unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is so cute, waiting eagerly for her cookie with her hand out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she's really enjoying the excitement of sneaking cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring over the sink, creating such a big puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how the woman can be so oblivious to all of this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she turns around soon and sees what's happening before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I should say something, but I don't want to spoil the children's fun.
segments.speaker: PAR
